forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. North northwest wind 2 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens under a mostly sunny guise, though the air carries a hint of coolness that falls upon the city like a soft whisper. Temperatures hover around 54 degrees, poised to drop slightly as the afternoon rolls in. A gentle wind from the west-northwest brushes through the streets, creating a delicate ballet of leaves and light, though the gusts, reaching up to 18 mph, may insistently remind you that warmth is relative in this coastal enclave.

As daylight slips into evening, the skies will remain partly cloudy, inviting a serene calmness. Dusk will usher in a chill, with temperatures dipping down to around 44 degrees. For those navigating the city’s charms, layering is key; a light jacket over a cozy sweater will provide comfort against the cool air. A leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the city’s hidden coffee spots could be an ideal way to soak in the pleasant moments of this day. Embrace the unique beauty of a city that thrums with character, whether it’s in the art-laden alleys or the bustling cafés, as the marine layer holds at bay the brightness of the sun, allowing for a day imbued with gentle clarity and a touch of intrigue.
